column2: kathaṃ punaḥ svasaṃvedanamātrasthitau hetuphalabhāvasiddhiḥ, yataḥ prakṛtaphalahetupaddhatir avadhānabhājanībhavatu | tathā hi, na pūrvā na parā nāpi tadubhayavāsanāprasūtānusandhānarūpā buddhir asmād idam iti bhedagrahaṇāntarīyakaṃ hetuphalabhāvānubhavavyavahāram avatarītuṃ śaknoti, sarvāsāṃ svavinmātramayatayānyadīyavārtāparicayānupapatteḥ | yady api cādya dhiyāvadhimātram adhigataṃ tathāpi nāvadhimat, parayā cāvadhimad eva nāvadhiḥ | anusandhānadhiyā tu naikayāpīti ko 'paraḥ pratipattā | avadhir avadhimad ity api tadbalād eva yasmān naikam api viṣayaḥ sataś ca tayor api śuddhasvarūpam eva viṣayaḥ |

column2: etena pūrvāparabhāvaḥ pratyākhyātaḥ, pūrvāparatayāpi kayācid grahāt, yena tadātmaka eva hetuphalabhāva iti manorathasiddhiḥ | na hi pratyakṣasyātra vyāpāraḥ, bhinnapratītabhāve pūrvāparatvāder dūrīkṛtatvāt | athāpi syāt, krameṇodayāt pūrvāparībhāvas tāvad asti, tataḥ pūrvāparā buddhir ātmānaṃ pūrvāparam evānubhūtigocarīkaroti | vimarśākāravirahāt tu śabda eva paramapravartitaḥ | na ca (87b) tāvatā vastvanubhavahāniḥ, na hi nāma rūpaṃ vastūnām, tad api paścād anusandhānabuddhyā pravartate | na ca tāvatā tasyāḥ svavedanakṣatiḥ | svasaṃveditaiva hi paratra bādhakam upasthāpayati, pūrvapūrvāhitaviśiṣṭasaṃskāradvāreṇa niyatapūrvāparabhāvabhodaka eva ca hetuphalabodha iti |

column2: ityādi | na ca parasya niṣedhapratibandhe kṛte svayaṃ sadvyavahārasiddhiḥ | atha parasyāpi parāmarśasiddhipratibandha eva, na kenacit pramāṇena hetuphalabhāvasiddhir iti nāsadvyavahārasiddhir iti cet, na, pareṇa tanmātrasyaivārabdhatvāt | sattāvyavahāro 'pi hi prasādhakapramāṇādhīnaḥ siddhas tad yadi hetuphalabhāve 'pi kiñcit pramāṇaṃ syāt, syāt tadbhāvaḥ | tadabhāve katham eṣa iti | tad ayaṃ hetuphalabhāvaḥ kvacit kadācit upalambhasambhāvanāvinākṛto bahirarthena sārdhaṃ niratyayām maitrīm āvahati |

column2: na khalu pūrvāparabhāvavyāpibhedagrahaṇavirodhini svasaṃvedane ca sthitiḥ pūrvāparībhūtahetuphalasvabhāvavedanaṃ ceti sacetasāmādaraviṣayaḥ, tadvaraṃ hetuphalagrahaṇam āñjasaṃ mṛṣyatāṃ vijñānavādavyasanaparityāga eva yuktaḥ | tato yathā prakāśādihetavo nirālambanasādhanāḥ saṃvṛtim āśritya vyavahārasmāraṇopayoginaḥ, tathā śaktisādhanānyāpi pramāṇavacanāni na virudhyante | bhedagrahaṇapūrvakaś ca hetuphalabhāvo viditaḥ sāṃvyavahārikasya | abhedagrāhiṇi pratyakṣe upajāte svayam eva parigalati, kadācid abhedam eva na gṛhṇīyāt | tatra dvayor api vādinor yāvad dhetuvyāpāraparisphuraṇaṃ (yāvad dhetuvyāpāraparisphuraṇaṃ) tāvat sādhu, saṃvṛtisthitayor eva vivādāt | tatra ca hetum antareṇa kva siddhivārtā | tarhi hetunā hetvabhāvaḥ sādhya iti hetur ātmānam apākarotīty arthaḥ syāt | nāyaṃ virodhaḥ, paramārthe tāvad dhetor evābhāvāt |

column2: rūpatrayanirūpaṇaviśuddhasādhanaprabhavaṃ prakṛtyā bahirmukhapravṛttikam anumānam anyavittināntarīyakam api parabodhasādhanāya sādhanīkurvantaḥ kvacit prakaraṇe tadarthānuvādinam eva virodhadūṣaṇena codayantīti ka eṣa nyāyaḥ | kevalaṃ yathā pṛthagjano nānumānaprāmāṇyaṃ parihṛtya jīvituṃ śakto dvaitābhiniveśāt, tathā tadavasthāpitasatyādhimokṣam api | ya eva ca tatsiddhasvabodhamātratāyāṃ satyādhimokṣaḥ sa eva bāhyānumānayor apamānaḥ | na ca tathā sthātuṃ śakyam, anyathā tadaiva sādhyasiddher abhyāsalakṣaṇaprayāsanirāsaprasaṅgāt | tatas ta eva viplavamahimna ātmādhimokṣād iva pravṛttau sākṣātkriyālābhe pratiṣiddhaḥ sarvatrago dharmadhātur iti nānumānasyāpalāpe punaḥ pratyāvṛttiḥ kṣīṇendhanaśikhinaḥ kṣaye 'pi bhasmavat | ata eva, nirālambā praśāmyatīti saṃvṛtisaṃjñitā vikalpabuddhir ity arthaḥ | ayam eva cārtho hetuphalavicāraprastāve anūdyate, nādhikaṃ vidhīyate | yāvad eva bahirmano 'numānaṃ ca, ayam eva hetuphalasvīkāraḥ, tadaiva tadāśrayasyaiva liṅgasya, parokṣe jñāpakatvāt, tatpratītau kārakatvāt | yaś ca paścād ātmavedanamātrasthitau tatparibhavaḥ sa eva hetuphalabhāvasyeti kim atrābhiniveśena | kathaṃ tarhi vijñānavāde vārttikakārasya kārakajñāpakavyavasthā | satyam avāntaravyavasthāmātram etat | ata eva buddhir āśritya kalpyeteti vacanarītiḥ | tattvaniṣkarṣe tu,

column2: [419] aśaktaṃ sarvam (PV III 4) ityādi | tad ayaṃ arthaḥ, advaitādarvāk, pratipādyajanasya mṛdumadhyādhimātrabuddhibhedād yathā tathā vā vyavasthā kriyeta, krameṇa matipāṭavāt tatra tatrānavasthitāv advaite viśvāsaḥ | ata evottarottaraparamārthavat saṃvṛter nānātve 'pi tadapekṣo hetuphalabhāvāvatāras trividhapratyakṣānupalambhasambhava eva tattvam | svābhiprete 'pi vañcanā mā bhūd iti tataḥ saṃvṛtyantarād iyam eva saṃvṛtir upādeyā, na punar aparamārthābhiniveśāviśeṣe 'py adhamā, abhiprāyasaṃvādetarābhyāṃ viśeṣāt | tad ayam aparyanuyoga eva katham apramāṇāt pratītimātrād arthasiddhiḥ kiṃ punar vicārabādhitād iti | na hi tatra kācid arthasiddhiḥ puruṣaparitoṣamātrād anyatra | yādṛśī sā pratītir eva pratītiḥ, tathānarthasiddhir evārthasiddhir iti yakṣānurūpo baliḥ | yady āryahṛdayānurodhaḥ, asmadīyahṛdayena tu sarvam asti, nipuṇena tu pratipattrā tathā pratipattavyam, yathā paritoṣamātre 'pi vipralabhyeta | ata evāha; (89b)

column2: tasmāt tattvataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāve 'pi saṃvṛtāvaśakyaparihāratvāt katham anavadheyaḥ | prakṛtasya phalasya hetusambhārāt sambhavaḥ, sāṃvyavahārikasyaiva tadanuṣṭhānārthitayā tadanusaraṇāt | tattvasākṣātkāriṇas tu yathā na hetuphalabhāvasiddhiḥ kvacit, tathānuṣṭhānam api na kvacit | katham anarthakāriṇaḥ sattvam iti cet? na, asmadapekṣayā svakṣaṇākṣīṇaparārthakriyāprabandhāvicchedāt | [420] tattvatas tu prakāśa eva vāstavī satteti vyavasthāpitaṃ citrasyaiva rūpasyeti sthitam |

column2: nānākāraṃ hi citram abhidhīyate, tataḥ parasparaviruddhadharmādhyāsinām ākārāṇāṃ katham abhedaḥ | bhedo 'pi tarhi katham ekavedanāntargatānāṃ bhinnasantānavat parasparam asaṃvedanāt ekasyaiva kasyacit pratibhāsaprasakteḥ | tad ayuktam, viruddhadharmādhyāsasya tadavasthatvāt | tasmād anekam evedam, abhinnopādānajanyatvāt tu parasparam adhyakṣabhāvaḥ sāhityapratibhāsasvabhāvaḥ | santānāntarabhuvāṃ tu buddhīnām abhinnopādānatāvirahān nātivyāptiḥ |

column2: na hi saṃvit parasaṃvidam āviśati | ekasaṃvidargalavigamād eva ca svaparavidām anyonyavedanāpavādaḥ | sa cāpracyutaḥ prastute 'pīti na viśeṣaḥ | nanu sāhityapratibhāse vyavasthāpye kim ekasaṃvidāveśena, sādhyavirodhinā tam antareṇāpi kṣater abhāvāt | nanu sāhityam ity api sahacāramātraṃ taddeśakālopaniyate lakṣaṇaṃ khyātam | pratibhāsaś ca teṣāṃ svasvarūpasākṣātkaraṇam iti nānyonyavedanam upapāditam, santam asamagrasannihitānekapuruṣavat | tataḥ parasparasaṃvidāveśa eva parasparavedanavyavahāropayogī kim atra sāhityamātreṇa | atha sarveṣāṃ sarvatra pratibhāsa eva sāhityapratibhāsaśabdenābhimataḥ, tadā sāhityapratibhāse 'pi sādhye viruddhaḥ sarvatraikasaṃvidāveśa iti riktā vācoyuktiḥ | tadarthatve hi sahāya evāyam |

column2: evaṃ hi saty utpattisārūpyābhyāṃ yad grāhyalakṣaṇaṃ tasya dūṣaṇād bhītir na kācid, bahirarthavādino 'nyathaiva grāhyagrāhakabhāvasya sulabhatvāt | tatropādānābhedāt parasparam anubhavaḥ sarveṣām anubhavasvabhāvatvāt | ekasāmagrījanyatve tu jaṭānubhavayoḥ pratiniyataṃ vedyatvaṃ vedakatvaṃ ca syāt | tatpratibandhāc ca nātiprasaṅgaḥ | atha jaṭasyāpi tadānīṃ sphuraṇāt kutaḥ pratiniyamaḥ | jaṭopādānatvād eva grāhyaṃ, tad anyad grāhakam iti | indriyeṇātivyāptir iti cet, na, sāmagrīsāmarthyād eva nīlasyaiva vedyatvenotpatteḥ |

column2: atha prakāśotpatteḥ sādhāraṇatvadoṣa iti cet | vedyatvenotpattir na prakāśatvena | kim idaṃ vedyatvam iti cet | svasaṃviditayoḥ kim idaṃ parasparavedanam iti samānam | atha na vedyatvaṃ prakāśotpatter anyad iti cet | tathāpi sādhāraṇatvaṃ sāmagrībalād eva parihariṣyate | athaikarūpatvād vastuno nīlatvavat prakāśenāprakāśenāpi nanv asādhāraṇena abhūtvā sthātum aśakyam | śakyam eva sāmagrībalād iti tūṣṇīkām āsyatām |

column2: [422] atha pramāṇavyāhato 'yam artha iti kva sāmagryāḥ śaktir upanīyatām | yas tarhi tadavatāram api nāpekṣate svarūpanirūpaṇe svayam eva parigalati, tatra katham upādānābhedanirdeśaḥ | na hi dvayoḥ prakāśayor utpannayor ekenānyaḥ prakāśyate, ekasyānyaḥ pratibhāti, ekasmin veti kācid arthasaṅgatiḥ | yathā hi pradīpasya svaprakāśaḥ kathañcid vidito jñāne tadanusāreṇānugamyate, tathā na pradīpānām anyonyaprakāśatāpi kācid upalabdhā | tato yathā dīpena dīpāntaraṃ prakāśitam iti viplavas tathā jñānena jñānāntaram iti | tat kasminn arthe ekopādānam uttaram astu | etena svasya vedanam ity ayogavyavacchedasyāpi (: ayogavyacchedasyāpi) nāpahnava evātivyāptiparihāraś cet? sulabha ity api nirastam, paravedanārthasyaivāpratiṣṭhānāt | paraprakāśo 'pi dṛṣṭa iti cet | so 'py aprakāśopādānasya prakāśakṣaṇāntarajananadvāreṇety anavasara eva jñānadīpādiṣu | yas tu tatrāpi sahabhāvinam ālokaṃ paṭasya prakāśakam icchati so 'pi na lokādhyavasāyamātreṇa tattvavyavastheti, idam asyeti vyavasthānibandhanānumāne yadi tajjñānajananam āśrayet, tat tarhi jñanena sahabhuvārthasya prakāśanasvīkāre nāstīti duḥsthā vyavasthā | athehāpi pṛṣṭhajavikalpajñānāpekṣayā sāmyam | tarhīdam eva grāhakaṃ na pūrvam | idaṃ tv abhinnakālam iti sautrāntikamatāvatāraḥ |

column2: atha nālokasya jñānajanane 'pi tāvatā prakāśakatvam, jñānam api sahabhāvy eva, kiṃ tu sāmagrītaḥ sahotpattimātreṇa, tarhi tadātanendriyāṇy api prakāśakāni prasajyeran, teṣām aprakāśarūpatvād iti cet | prakāśo 'pi prakāśa evāstu, prakāśakas tu katham | na hi pītasya sahabhāvamātreṇa nīlaṃ pītakaṃ bhavitum arhati | tasmān nākiñcitkaraṃ kasyacit sambandhapaddhatim adhyāste | kāraṇopakāradvāreṇa tu pradīpo 'prakāśasvabhāve ghaṭādau dṛṣṭas tadvyavahārabhāk, tatas tajjñānasya jñānāntaraṃ prakāśam iti gamyamānaikopādānabhāve na ṣaṣṭhīṃ prayuñjīta nāma | na punar adhyakṣatāpekṣayā, caitrasya maitraḥ sundara ity atra yathā gamyamānasaundaryatāpekṣayā (ｰsaudaryatāｰ), na tu saundaryāpekṣayādhyakṣatā, saundaryayor ekātmaniṣṭhatvāt |

column2: naivaṃ kaścit prayuṅkta iti cet | yadi paribhāvakaḥ syāt tad api kathaṃ prayuñjīta, samānatvāt nyāyasya | tad asyāndhadugdhanyāyena grahaṇe gatam etad grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇavaidhuryadvāreṇādvayasādhanaṃ nyāyanāyakasya | na cāyaṃ nyāyaḥ, tat kim anena vārttikakāradveṣāt śubhaguptajuṣṭaloṭanena | anekapradīpavad eva tarhi saṃvidaḥ sahitāḥ pratibhānti bhinnāś ceti vedanenāpi ko 'rtha iti cet, na, vyatiriktapratipatryapekṣayā hi sahitāḥ prakāśanta iti vyavahāraḥ | nanu tadabhāve 'pi sahitānāṃ prakāśanaṃ na kṣīṇam | evam etat | na tu

column2: tad ayam ekasāmagrīsambhavo 'vyabhicāradvāreṇa kvacid ekadarśane 'nyānumānāya prabhavet, nānyādhyakṣatvāya, rasarūpādivat | evam ekopādānatāpi sajāyīyatām adhikāṃ prasādhayet, na svabhāvasaṃkarasādhyam anyaprakāśam | anyathā kvacid ekam anyasya jaṭam ity api syād iti | etenābhinnopādānatvam eva parasparapratibhāsa ity api kalpanam apāstam, ekopādānānāṃ jaṭānām api parasparajaṭatvaprasaṅgāt | ātmātmarūpeṇa hi teṣām api jaṭatvam, evaṃ prakāśatvam api ||

column2: [424] tajjñānaṃ tadvad anyad api gāṭhasvāpādyavasthānantaraṃ cālayavijñānāt pradeśabhedena citrād eva citrāntarotpattiḥ | astu vā sammūrchitākārād ekasmāt kadācit kutracit citrasya krameṇākrameṇa vā bhāvaḥ | yadā tāvat jāgarānantaraṃ yāvatkālam anavaruddho middhādibhis tāvat prathamakṣaṇabhuvo vihāya nāpareṣāṃ parasparam anubhavaḥ syāt, upādānabhedāt | paramparayā tadekaprabodhād iti cet | yathā yathā tarhi vyavadhānaṃ, tathā tathā mandatātāratamyād anyonyaprakāśapraṇāśaḥ kiyatāpy antareṇa syāt | citraprakāśāvināśaś ca jāgarādibhir anekaṃ dinam anubhūyate, nāpi mandatātāratamyam | naivaṃ jñānākāre śakyam iti cet | ekākārasaṃvedanena bhinnasya saṃvedanam ity api kathaṃ śakyaṃ yadi nāmopādānābhedaḥ, svagatasyaiva bhedābhedasya prayojakatvāt | na ca prasaṅge tattvam eva, viparyayaparyavasāyitvāt |

column2: svabhāvaviprakṛṣṭo hi parasparasya bodhaḥ, tāṃ ca sīmānam atikramya sannikarṣaḥ svaprabhāvam ādarśayati, sa copādānenaiva sārdhaṃ mukhya iti ekasāmagryadhīnānumānavad dhetupratītidvāraka eva sahabhuvo bhinnasyānubhavaḥ syāt | atītatvān neti cet | svabhāvakālaviprakarśayor na kaścid viśeṣaḥ | athopādānasya dvayam apy etat, sahabhuvas tu svabhāvaviprakarṣamātram | atra tarhi sannikṛṣṭatvam api nikṛṣṭam | upādāne tu prauṭham iti godhāśaśanyāyaḥ | sannikarṣabalāc ca grahaṇasthitiḥ athātītasphuraṇe vartamānatvam eva syāt, katham atītatvam | tato nātītasphūrtiḥ | yadīdṛśī tattvadṛṣṭiḥ parasyātmabhūtayā saṃvidā (91b) saṃvedyamānaṃ paraṃ svarūpam eva syāt kathaṃ paravittiḥ |

column2: tatrānunmīlitākṣasya sannikarṣaghoṣaṇam anyatrāpy astu | yogivad vātītagrahanam api syāt | evaṃ prabandhapravṛttau pūrvapūrvasarvakṣaṇavīkṣaṇaprasaṅgo yāvad ekam upādānam anavadhir vā | yathā vyavadhitāratamyaṃ tathā sannikarṣaprauṭhitāratamyam iti | evaṃ svopādeyasyāpi pratibhāsaprasaṅge sarvaṃ tadvat | api ca yadi citrapratibhāsasya bheda eva tadā nīlapītavan nilakhaṇṭayor apīti paramāṇuparyantadarśanāt na kiñcid ekaṃ saṃviditam asti yasyānyad ekopādānaṃ syād ity apratirodhamāndhyam aśeṣasya jagataḥ | na vā kiñcid ity etatparyavasāno 'yaṃ vādaḥ |

column2: [427] vyaktiviśeṣam eva hi jñānasyākāraṃ vidmaḥ | deśavitānābhāvaś ca deṣasyālpatvaṃ vā syād abhāva eva vā | tatra paramāṇuparimāṇe 'pi deśe prasaṅgī doṣaḥ kiyaty alpe pratihanyeteti na prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ | dvitīyas tu asambhavī sambhavinaḥ, sambhavinā hi niyamena kvacid bhāvyam | kvacid apy abhāve 'bhāva eva vibhāvito bhavati | saṃvedyante cāsukhasaumanasyādayo dehāntas tadbahirdeśavyavacchedena sphurantaḥ | anyathā prakāśavan nīlādibhiḥ abhede tadvad eva doṣaḥ |

column2: tatra ca kāye kiyantam abhivyāpya deśam āsata iti kim anena | kā vā sadeśatā, rūpe 'pi svarūpātirekiṇo deśasaṃjñitasya kvacid anupalabdheḥ | nāpy ādhāra eva deśo, vātātapayor apy adeśatāprasakteḥ | na ca tadapekṣayā bādhakapravṛttiḥ, kiṃ tu svarūpāpekṣayā | svarūpaṃ ca niraṅgam api kalpanābuddhau yathā vyatiriktair iva dharmāntaraiḥ parikaritam ābhāti, tathā ihedam iti kālākāravimarśapratyanīkapratyayakalpito nabhogatipratidvandvīva deśo na nāma vyavahāram avatarati | na ceyaṃ gatir antaṛsukhasaumanasyādivedane dūravartinī sparśantavad ity uktaprāyam | atha yathā nīlādau viśadatarordhvādharādibhāgatvaṃ vitastiḥ hastahastipuruṣādiparimāṇaparicchedyatvaṃ copalabhyate, na tathā sukhādiṣv iti matiḥ, tataḥ kiṃ deśavattāmātraparijñāne | evaṃ hy asparśanendriyagandharasadhvaniprabhṛtīnām apy adeśatāprasaṅgaḥ | na ca parokṣe vahnyādāv api pratiniyatadeśatādi śakyam |

column2: atha yatra phale gandharasasambhavas tāvati vartamānau niyatadeśābūhituṃ śakyau, parapūrvādibhāgena ca grahaṇakāle cendriyaśeṣaparimāṇeneti cet | sukhādy api dehāntargatābhogād deśaparimāṇena (: dehāntargatābhogād deśaparimāṇena) kiṃ na śakyaṃ pratipattum | avyāptis tu phale gandharasayor upalabdhā | bhoktur niyatadeśopalambha iti cet | so 'pi sthūlagrāhī nāṇuśaḥ pratiniyamena deśam avasātuṃ śaktaḥ | tasmād atra tāvad vartate kiyantam api deśam (92b) abhivyāpyeti samānam | evaṃ grahaṇakāle 'pīndriyadeśaparimityasya pratiniyamaniścaya eva | sukhāder api vā sa eva nyāyo darśanaśravaṇajanitasyāpi | apriyāvalokanataptaṃ hi locanam eva priyadarśane śītalībhavad anubhūyate | kharāṃśutaptasya taṭāgāvagāhane tu vyaktaḥ parimāṇaviśeṣa ūrdhvādharabhāgo vā | anyadeśodayasya tatrāropakalpane 'pi sa eva deśaḥ syāt | parimāṇaniyamo bhūmiṣu bhūbhujām ucitaḥ | idam eva ca nṛsukhaṃ yacchābdaṃ saṃvedanam iti na bhinnasiddhiḥ, spaṣṭapratibhāsād vā | saumanasyasya tu mānasatvād aspaṣṭapratibhāse 'pi tadanusāreṇa [428] sambhavina ihaiva kvacid deśa iti sāmānyena siddher apratibandhāt | nāpi nirbandhas tatropayogī, sādhyasyāpi vikalpakatvaprasaṅgāt |

column2: kiṃ ca parimāṇaniyamānavadhāraṇe yadi deśavattāniṣedhaḥ kvacit, kālavattā tu sarvasya mā bhūt kṣaṇasya svaparimāṇenāvadhārayitum aśakyatvāt | kevalaṃ pūrvaṃ nāsīt paścāc ca na bhavatīti pratiniyatakālatām upasthāpayati sthavīyasī buddhiḥ | ihāpi na bahirdehād ihaiva tu saumanasyādīti niścayaḥ sthita eva | kiṃ ca, kālayogas tāvad iṣṭa eva saumanasyādeḥ, anyathā kadāpy abhavataḥ sādhvī bādhakayuktiḥ, sa eva ca deśavattām upanayati, kvacid abhavataḥ kadācid bhāvayogāt | yatraiva cāsti sa eva deśaḥ, sa tu sthūlaḥ sūkṣmo veti kim anena | kāle tu prayojanāntarāpekṣayā niyamasthāpanam iti ||

column2: satā avaśyam ekadhā bhāvyam iti cet? na, vyāpakatvāt tayor anyatarasandehe sattvasyaiva sandehāt | svasaṃvedanasya tu śaktiṃ śvetādivad eva dūrīkuru, mā tatpratyāśayā sthāḥ | na ca pramāṇāntaram astīti parasya sandigdhāsiddhim udbhāvayato 'pi na svayaṃ sadvyavahāraḥ sādhakabādhakavaidhurye (93a) sandehasya nyāyaprāptatvāt | svasaṃvidite ca [429] nīlādijñānasvarūparāśau bādhādarśanam eva balavad bījam asya | tata eva tarhi bhavatu svasaṃvido 'prāmāṇyam, bādhāyā abhāve tu prāmāṇyam iti cet, naivam, adarśanamātreṇābhāvasiddheḥ | bahiḥ samastam abhyastam abādhakasya ca sādhakasambhavān nāparo dṛśyānupalambhaḥ | śāstra eva tu cintito 'yam abādhavāda ity āstāṃ tāvat |

column2: ālokākārayogo hi bhrāntir bhavatām | tadabhāvād avidyādayaḥ svabhāva eva bhavabhājāṃ bhaveyuḥ, ālambanadvāreṇālīkatve sukhāder api prasaṅgāt | tato 'niṣṭatayā hānam upādānam anyathā keṣāñcid iti sākārapakṣa evākṣarāntareṇoktaḥ | ākāracakraikadeśadṛśyaspṛśyaparyavasānaṃ tu vaimatyam iti na kiñcid etat | yathā bhrāntitve 'py aniṣṭatayā kasyacit tyāgas tathālīkatve 'pīṣṭatayā ākāraviśeṣasya sthitir astv iti sādhyakṣatiḥ | caittāś caite sukhādaya iṣyante, cittaṃ viṣayagrāhitayā ākārasvarūpaṃ heyam, caittaṃ cāvasthāyīti nāyaṃ samprayuktadharma ity āgamavirodhaḥ | abhede ca cittavad evālīkatvaṃ teṣāṃ tadvad vā cittasyāpi satyateti katham anākārasya sādhyasya siddhiḥ |

column2: iti cet | tat tarhi na tāvat sādhyaṃ, yathokta evecchāparisamāpteḥ | nāpi sādhanaṃ kasyacid arthasya, nirākārāt kvacid arthasiddher asiddheḥ | parārthasiddhir api viśiṣṭākārapratibaddhaivety uktaprāyam | idānīm ākārād evārthasiddhiḥ paratas tu nirākārād iti ka evaṃ pratyeṣyati syādvādād (syādvādād) anyatra | āgamād evam iti cet | kva yuktibādhite 'rthe śaraṇam āgamaḥ | (93b) puṇyajñānasaṃvalitākāraviśeṣeṇa viśiṣyamāṇārthaśaktis tatprakarṣaparyante svayam api prakarṣaparyantavartiny eva syāt, kathaṃ tato vicchidyeta, anyato vā sambhavet | kasya kadācit pratītir evāsambhaviṇī, na cāgamo 'pi mukhyākṣara īdṛgarthaḥ, vyākhyāntarāśrayas tu yuktiprāgalbhye bhavet, sā ca kṣīṇeti cintitam | tathāpi bādhabhayāt bhaktavyam eva tadvapuḥ, abādhatvāc ca tad evārthasamartham ity api sidhyatu, tata eva ca prāg api tadupāyiny evārthaśaktir iti cet |

column2: [432] iti | tatrākiñcanādiviśeṣaṇaṃ vyomna eva rajonīhārādikṛtasya (94a) nimnonnatasya darśane 'py abhāvavibhāvanāyeti vyaktam etat | sambuddhe 'pīty anuktvā buddheṣv iti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bādhakabahuvacananirdeśayatnāt |sugate tu bhagavati yathoktākāre evāpavādasamāropalakṣaṇasya nimnonnatasya darśane 'pi na bhāva itīyad eva vivakṣitam | astu vā vacanapariṇāmena bhagavaty api yojanam | yathā tv ācāryavasubandhupādair dharmadharmitāprativibhāge nirvikalpajñānalakṣaṇaprastāve dvayena grāhyagrāhakabhāvena nirūpayitum aśakyatvād arūpi, saviṣayatvād anābhāsam iti vibhaktam, tatheha buddha iti prayukte 'py astu | akiñcanatvam apy āgantukarāgādivigamāj jñeyam | śeṣam aviruddham | ata eva dharmadharmitāvibhāge eva,

column2: avaśyaṃ hi prakāśamānam etac citraṃ śūnyatayā sākṣātkartavyam, tāvataiva bodhisiddhir iti kim apareṇa | na ca svasaṃvedanād anyat sākṣātkāri | sā ca tathatā saṃkleśavyavadānāvasthāsādhāraṇaś cittadharma iti svābhāvikaḥ sahajaḥ prakṛtir iti cābhidhīyamāno 'pi vyavadānāpekṣayā dharmakāyavyahāragocaraḥ | tatra kṣaṇikatā tāvad ākāraviśeṣānapekṣāsau bhāvyamānā yo ya evākāraḥ sannidhīyate, taṃ tam eva pratividhyatīti dharmitāniyatatallakṣaṇādiniṣpādakapuṇyasambhārasahakārikāraṇopanītam antimaṃ tam evākāram āśrayīkaroti | tatra prāgavasthāyāṃ citram eva tatparatantram ucyate | abhūtaparikalpo vikalpa iti coktaḥ | paryante tu citra eva vitathakalpanāyām aprayojakatvān na tathocyate | tadrūparahitas tūcyate | (94b) hetupāratantryamātrasambhave 'pi cāsadvāsanāpāratantryābhāve paratantro 'pi nābhidhīyate, kiṃ tu sambhoga iti, dharmasambhogād daśabhūmibhiḥ sambhujyamānatvāc ca | tattvato vā hetupahalabhāvāt kva pāratantryam iti | tasmād dharmarūpa eva dharmakāyaḥ | nanu,

column2: iti | evaṃ ca sati yady api sādhanam api tat, tathāpi na tanmātreṇa tatrādaraḥ, kiṃ tu tattvam ity eva | sādhyasādhanayor anantabhāvo 'pi kuta iti cet | tattvasākṣātkārasyaiva sādhyatvāt, tadbhāvanāyā eva ca sādhanatvāt, tadabhāve 'niścaye vā tayor eva lopāśakteḥ | tasya ca pratibhāsinaiva dharmiṇā caritārthatvān niścāyakapramāṇaparyeṣaṇaiva param avaśiṣyata iti samāptaḥ puruṣārthaḥ | tac ca sāmānyarūpam eva bhāvyam, kṣaṇikatvādivad iti svabhāvāntaram avasthāpyate | tadadhigamādhīnaś ca buddhadhvanir iti tad eva pradhānaṃ buddharūpam, sa eva vā buddha ucyate, pratāpa eva rājetyādivat | lakṣaṇādicitratā hi cakravartinīty uttaratantram | na caivam arthāntarasya kathañcit sattve 'pi kaścid upayogaḥ | tato dharmakāyasaṃjñāpy asya yācitakamaṇḍanam iti na nirākāradarśanānurodhaḥ kaścit | ata eva dehabhogapratiṣṭhāviśeṣaśālini,
